opinion.caption: SENATOR ROY E. GRANTHAM
opinion.opinion_text: OPINION — AG — UNDER THE PROVISO OF SECTION 14, NO FUNDS MAY BE DISBURSED UNDER SECTION 7 OF THE RESOLUTION, UNTIL $250,00 SHALL HAVE BEEN PAID AFTER THE EFFECTIVE DATE THEREOF INTO "DRIVER'S EDUCATION FUND" CREATED BY THE RESOLUTION. CITE: ARTICLE V, SECTION 58 (FRED HANSEN)
